data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Cuvette-Ouest. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cuvette-Ouest, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Cuvette-Ouest, Republic of Congo to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Cuvette-Ouest, Republic of Congo.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Cuvette-Ouest, Republic of Congo.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Cuvette-Ouest, Republic of Congo. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the South Asian, general people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the South Asian, general people.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Cuvette-Ouest.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Cuvette-Ouest, Republic of Congo, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, move the 7,347 believers in the state of Cuvette-Ouest to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

location.name: Cuvette-Ouest
